scenario_text.value:
I...can’t run away. It wouldn’t even give
me a chance if I tried.

The two of us shall be snuffed out at this
pace. At the very least, you should...

Hold your tongue, birdbrain! You think I can
just run off on my own?!

Dammit, dammit! What should we do?! There’s
gotta be something!
What would Takuma do at a time like this...?
...Wait, Takuma?

No... Takuma ain’t here right now. It’s just
me and Falcomon.

I can’t rely on him, or anyone else. I’ve
gotta get outta this mess by myself!
Ho, quite a cool statement from you, my boy.

Cool? I ain’t trying to play the hero or
nothing, though...

Huh, I guess heroes get in fights with tough
foes that look like they’ll take them down.

But even so, those heroes will joke around to
lift their own spirits.

Even if there’s nowhere to run, if they’re
cowards or weaklings... All to move forward.

Right! I ain’t going nowhere, Falcomon! Maybe
I’m not hero material...

But when the chips are down, I’ll do what
I’ve gotta do. That’s who I want to be!

So I’ll grit my teeth and hold my ground.
I’ll hold back the enemy as long as I can!

We can still do this—still fight! I’ll
believe in you, Falcomon, and fight on!

Precisely, my boy...! That’s why I know I can
trust you to have my back!
Minoru, I—Augh! Hnngh... Gah!
Falcomon?! No way...again?!

Indeed, Minoru! Your strong spirit... I can
perceive it clearly!

It is time once again to take flight!
Uwooooooh!
*huff* *huff*...

Whoa! Yeah, now we can actually do this!
I think!
Don’t worry, Minoru. I’ll make this quick!
